thread.section_title: Flologic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flologic | flologic.com
thread.title: Howard Owen

author: Howard Owen
title: Howard Owen
text:
After a plumbing disaster forced us out of our home for four months, I researched several devices to prevent such a thing from happening again. Flologic got the nod as the most robust system available at the time. It was easy to install and program, although the latter took some tweaking to adjust to our needs. The biggest issue was that when our water softener regenerated, it would trip the protection. In the end I had to program a one hour run time in Home mode to allow the softener to finish its cycle.
The support is as good as the product. Any time I emailed a question it was answered quickly, usually the same day. I would buy this system again without reservation.
